column2: The Inner Court has been completely subdued by the bureaucracy. The Emperor, Empress, and Eunuch factions are all politically weak right now. Is this an opportunity, or a disaster?
Though no faction holds dominance within the Inner Court, the Eunuchs appear to be the only politically solvent faction at the moment.
The Eunuchs have achieved a monopoly on power within the Inner Court.
Though no faction holds dominance within the Inner Court, the Empress appears to be the only politically solvent faction at the moment.
The Emperor appears to be politically weaker than the Empress and Eunuchs.
The Eunuchs command the most influence within the Inner Court, but the Empress is still politically solvent. The Emperor is politically useless.
